list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I realize that I can’t have everything I want

list_definition.definition: to make real; to make (something) come true

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He realized his ambition to become an astronaut
He realized $60,000 on the sale of his apartment.
